channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The whole Road is covered in huge pot holes. Dangerous to drive down, 10th February
item.description:
Visit.riches.covers In the middle and the side of the road. Take your pick the whole road is falling apart

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold

item.title: The road has now disintegrated so much and badly there is a deep trench along the centre of the road, running for several feet. This is just after the brow of the hill at the crossroads for The Crippetts and Farm Lane and once you’ve swerved to avoid it there are more potholes just before to turning into Meadowsweet Road., 10th February
item.description:
Section of Leckhampton Lane between Crippetts Lane and Meadowsweet Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leckhampton Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury

item.title: Shocking state of road, 10th February
item.description:
This has been reported several times in the last 6 weeks and still remains unrepaired within your 28 day guidelines. This report serves to capture a final communication, so that any and all damage sustained to vehicles hereafter have the legal right for compensation due to failure in your part to address this major concern.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes down Albert Road, 10th February
